document_data.mainbody: '''''Staff maces''''' were [[enchanted]] [[staves]] that transformed into hafted maces in battle.
document_data.Description: ''Staff maces'' were magically designed to help [[cleric]]s or [[druid]]s traverse wilderness. They can be used to walk difficult terrains and wielded as [[mace]]s when dealing with dangerous wildlife.
document_data.Powers: These weapons radiated a faint aura of [[transmutation]] magic. When these staves' [[command word]] was spoken, they transformed into a mace-like weapon. It possessed a strong ''+2'' enchantment and could be easily wielded by anyone who can use a simple staff.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the [[elf|elven]] [[mage]] [[Dradeel]] kept a ''staff mace'' inside his cabin on the [[Isle of Balduran]] in the [[Trackless Sea]]. The same year, several staves could be found in the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]]: [[Ribald Barterman]] sold them in his [[Adventurer Mart]] in the [[Waukeen's Promenade]]; [[Mistress Ada]] sold them in the [[Temple of Talos (Athkatla)|Temple of Talos]]; and [[Haz]], a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]] wielded it in battle against Athkatlan [[vampire]]s. The [[Temple of Umberlee (Brynnlaw)|Temple of Umberlee]] on the isle of [[Brynnlaw]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]] sold ''staff mace''.
